oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial of Tennessee State Capitol area, Nashville, Tennessee, 1961 January 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial photograph of the Tennessee State Capitol Building and downtown area, Nashville, Tennessee, January 3, 1961. Several buildings of the central business district are visible such as the Life and Casualty Tower, Nashville Municipal Auditorium, and others. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville Municipal Auditorium (Tenn.); Life and Casualty Insurance Company of Tennessee
